bug.author: nkumar15
bug.summary: Version 0.6.1 installation fails in existing minikube cluster
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: Tried installing kubeflow with below instructions and noticed error. <denchmark-code> kfctl init ${KFAPP} --config=${CONFIG} -V cd ${KFAPP} kfctl generate all -V kfctl apply all -V INFO[0082] creating rule/promtcp filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0083] creating rule/stdiotcp filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0083] creating rule/stdio filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0084] creating rule/tcpkubeattrgenrulerule filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0084] creating DestinationRule/istio-policy filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0084] creating DestinationRule/istio-telemetry filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0086] creating ConfigMap/istio-parameters-9m7m4fhdb8 filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0087] creating Gateway/kubeflow-gateway filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0088] creating ServiceEntry/google-api-entry filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0088] creating ServiceEntry/google-storage-api-entry filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0089] creating VirtualService/google-api-vs filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0090] creating VirtualService/google-storage-api-vs filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0090] creating VirtualService/grafana-vs filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0091] creating ClusterRbacConfig/default filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0092] creating CustomResourceDefinition/applications.app.k8s.io filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0093] creating ServiceAccount/application-controller-service-account filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0094] creating ClusterRole/application-controller-cluster-role filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0095] creating ClusterRoleBinding/application-controller-cluster-role-binding filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0096] creating ConfigMap/application-controller-parameters filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0097] creating Service/application-controller-service filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0098] creating StatefulSet/application-controller-stateful-set filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" Error: couldn't apply KfApp: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: kfApp Apply failed for kustomize: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: couldn't create resources from application Error: no matches for kind "Application" in version "app.k8s.io/v1beta1" </denchmark-code>
What did you expect to happen: Kubeflow to be successfully installed in minikube. Anything else you would like to add: No Environment:
Kubeflow version: (version number can be found at the bottom left corner of the Kubeflow dashboard): minikube version: v1.1.0 kfctl v0.6.1-rc.2-1-g3a37cbc6 kubectl version 1.14 os ubuntu-18.02

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.99. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
run again this kfctl apply all -V, the error gone. it is quite weird.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/bruceding>@bruceding</denchmark-link> thanks for suggestion, I tried but it didn't worked for me. Got other error on running kfctl apply all -V again. <denchmark-code>INFO[0131] creating Service/grafana filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0134] creating Service/istio-citadel filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0136] creating Service/istio-egressgateway filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0138] creating Service/istio-galley filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" INFO[0140] creating Service/istio-ingressgateway filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:440" Error: couldn't apply KfApp: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: kfApp Apply failed for kustomize: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: couldn't create resources from istio-install Error: Service "istio-ingressgateway" is invalid: spec.ports[1].nodePort: Invalid value: 31380: provided port is already allocated Usage: kfctl apply [all(=default)|k8s|platform] [flags]
Flags: -h, --help help for apply -V, --verbose verbose output default is false
couldn't apply KfApp: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: kfApp Apply failed for kustomize: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: couldn't create resources from istio-install Error: Service "istio-ingressgateway" is invalid: spec.ports[1].nodePort: Invalid value: 31380: provided port is already allocated </denchmark-code>
And after doing minikube ssh yes I can see 31380 is in LISTEN state <denchmark-code>sudo netstat -tuln | grep LISTEN | grep 31380 tcp 0 0 :::31380 :::* LISTEN </denchmark-code>
Looks like previous step failure left kubeflow installation caused it being in use.
